welcome_message_body: "Welcome to El Palmar, a charming city nestled in the heart of Guatemala! Known for its beautiful landscapes and rich culture, we invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that El Palmar has to offer. Enjoy your stay and soak up the local flavor!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Base Aerea Del Sur Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Base Aerea Del Sur Airport is used for shipping and receiving goods.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Quetzaltenango Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Quetzaltenango Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for free.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Coatepeque Airport serves both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Coatepeque Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
